00001 /** 
00002  * @mainpage API Specification
00003  *
00004  * This document contains the whole API specification for the BNG Bootloader
00005  * project, as generated by the Doxygen documentation generator tool.
00006  * 
00007  * The document is built from the C sources into different formats, it's made
00008  * available in HTML and PDF formats. Please refer to the project's
00009  * documentation for the exact location of these documents.
00010  * 
00011  * The complete project (prosa) documentation is built from ReST sources using
00012  * Sphinx and can be found in HTML format at the address:
00013  * http://garetjax.github.com/Bootloader/
00014  *
00015  * @section Overview
00016  *
00017  * @todo  Move this documentation to another file or to the Sphinx documentation.
00018  *
00019  * Before presenting the in-depth API documentation, the UML diagram in Fig. 1.1
00020  * was created to present an higher-level overview of the API.
00021  *
00022  * The \c Controller "class" representes our \c main function, and is
00023  * responsible for the initialization of the various parts of the system,
00024  * their respective interconnection (serial interface initialization, command
00025  * registration,...) and the routing of every received command to the command
00026  * dispatcher, which will in turn call the right command passing the parsed
00027  * tokens as arguments.
00028  *
00029  * Each command will then execute its task interacting with either the
00030  * application manager or the configuration registry. 
00031  * 
00032  * @note
00033  *   - Different realation graphs are automatically generated by Doxygen during the
00034  *     build phase, please refer to them for an in-dept view.
00035  *   - In the diagram below, each package representes a component, a class a C
00036  *     source file and the methods, the different functions contained in the
00037  *     file (the only exception is the \c Command interface, which representes
00038  *     the type of a command like function).
00039  *   - The details about the function prototypes where omitted for the
00040  *     sake of clarity.
00041  *
00042  * @image html APIOverview.png "Figure 1.1 â€“ API Overview"
00043  * @image latex APIOverview.eps "API Overview" width=\textwidth
00044  *
00045  */
00046
